alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 10:51AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern St. Louis, Carlton and northwestern Douglas Counties through 1115 AM CDT... At 1051 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Cromwell, to near Foxboro, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Foxboro around 1055 AM CDT. Oliver around 1100 AM CDT. South Range around 1105 AM CDT. Superior, Cloquet, Wisconsin Point and Fond Du Lac Band Brookston Area around 1110 AM CDT. Brookston and Saginaw around 1115 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Cody, Grand Lake, Park Point, Billings Park, Gary New Duluth, Morgan Park, Lakeside-Lester Park, Amnicon Lake, Sawyer and Spirit Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
